Class EmailDetailsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.emailservice.service.EmailDetailsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmailDetailsService
@Service
public class EmailDetailsServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmailDetailsService
Service implementation for managing email details in the database

    • saveDetails

      public void saveDetails​(EmailDetailsMessage emailDetailsMessage)
      Saves email details from an email details message to the database for the user id in the message
      Specified by:
      saveDetails in interface EmailDetailsService
      Parameters:
      emailDetailsMessage - email details (except token) to be saved/added to the database for that user id

    • saveToken

      public void saveToken​(TokenMessage tokenMessage)
      Saves token from a token message to the database for the user id in the message
      Specified by:
      saveToken in interface EmailDetailsService
      Parameters:
      tokenMessage - message with token and a user id for which the token should be saved in the database

    • getCompleteDetailsOrNull

      public EmailDetails getCompleteDetailsOrNull​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Retrieves full email details including token for a user id if all the information is present, otherwise null.
      Specified by:
      getCompleteDetailsOrNull in interface EmailDetailsService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to retrieve full email details
      Returns:
      email details including all the information if available, otherwise null.

    • deleteEmailDetails

      public void deleteEmailDetails​(EmailDetails emailDetails)
      Deletes the supplied email details from the database
      Specified by:
      deleteEmailDetails in interface EmailDetailsService
      Parameters:
      emailDetails - the email details object to delete from the database
